examples: The movie was so boring, I fell asleep.
O filme foi tão entediante que eu adormeci.
Acho a aula de matemática entediante.

suggested: Why did the scarecrow win an award? It was outstanding in its field of boredom!
Sometimes, the word 'boring' can remind us of moments when we feel uninterested, uninspired, or disconnected.
Why do some people insist on making activities boring and draining the enjoyment out of them? It's so frustrating!
Did you know that what one person finds boring, another might find fascinating? It's all a matter of personal interests and perspectives.
There's no specific smell associated with the word 'boring', but it can evoke memories of places or situations that lacked stimulation or excitement.
The feeling of restlessness, monotony, or disinterest that can be associated with finding something boring.
The experience of finding common ground with others when discussing shared opinions about what is considered boring or engaging.
